availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Tennessee native. Married to Kitty Kennedy in Logan County, Kentucky in January 1819. Married to Hetta Kennedy in 1850. Father of Mary and Benjamin McCutchen. Owned 11 enslaved people in Logan County in 1840. Farmer in Logan County in 1850. Farmer in Logan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Logan County Marriages, Film #002134965.
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan, p. 190.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan, District 1, p. 47B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan, District 1, p. 379.
